comment:
Nurses in primary health care (PHC) facilities always show nonchalant attitudes. This makes us feel inhuman. If there's an audit body that gets feedback from patients in PHC, it will help to deter this notorious attitude. people can die quickly if adequate attention is not paid to them when hospitalised.

Evbomodu.
